instruction: Please provide a detailed breakdown of our workforce by race and ethnicity in order to improve transparency and our ability to assess diversity efforts.
output: While we currently disclose our gender breakdown, we recognize the importance of providing further transparency and accountability in regards to our workforce breakdown by race and ethnicity. In response to this request, we will immediately begin gathering and analyzing data on our workforce demographics and will provide a comprehensive breakdown as soon as possible. We understand the importance of this information and our commitment to diversity and inclusion.
